_metadata.title: QIF Ethics & Governance Controls
_metadata.description: Neurorights definitions, governance frameworks, and consent tiers mapped to QIF hourglass bands.

MP.name: Mental Privacy
MP.shortDef: Your thoughts are yours. No one should read, store, or re-link them without permission.

CL.name: Cognitive Liberty
CL.shortDef: You decide what enters your mind. No forced stimulation or suppression.

MI.name: Mental Integrity
MI.shortDef: Your brain should not be harmed, altered, or have its natural rhythms disrupted without consent.

PC.name: Psychological Continuity
PC.shortDef: Your sense of self should remain stable. No covert personality changes.

CA.name: Cognitive Authenticity
CA.shortDef: Your thoughts should be genuinely yours, not implanted or manufactured.

standard.label: Standard Consent
standard.description: Standard informed consent sufficient. Low-risk, reversible interventions.

enhanced.label: Enhanced Consent
enhanced.description: Extended disclosure required. Moderate risk, partially reversible.

IRB.label: IRB/Ethics Board Required
IRB.description: Institutional review required. High risk, potentially irreversible.

prohibited.label: Prohibited
prohibited.description: No ethical justification exists. Lethal or permanently disabling.

governance_frameworks.name: EU Charter of Fundamental Rights Art. 3
